Container.Name: wh-paperless-ngx
Container.Overview: A community-supported supercharged version of paperless: scan, index and archive all your physical documents.
Container.Requires: Paperless-ngx requires: - A Redis-compatibile database. (e.g. Redis, Valkey, KeyDB, DragonflyDB) - (Optional) A PostgreSQL or MySQL/MariaDB database. Paperless-ngx will fallback to SQLite if no database is provided. - (Optional) Tika & Gotenberg for parsing Office documents & '.eml'-files.

Config.Name: Paperless-ngx web UI port
Config.Description: The TCP port Paperless-ngx listens on.

Config.Name: Paperless-ngx storage
Config.Description: The location where Paperless-ngx stores its data.

Config.Name: Paperless-ngx media
Config.Description: The location where Paperless-ngx stores your documents.

Config.Name: Paperless-ngx consumption
Config.Description: The location where Paperless-ngx looks for documents to import.

Config.Name: Paperless-ngx export
Config.Description: The location where Paperless-ngx exports documents upon selection.

Config.Name: TZ
Config.Description: Specify a timezone: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones#List

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_REDIS
Config.Description: The Redis connection URL, e.g. redis://USER:PASS@HOST:PORT/DATABASE

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_DBENGINE
Config.Description: The database engine for Paperless-ngx.

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_DBHOST
Config.Description: The database hostname.

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_DBPORT
Config.Description: The database port.

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_DBNAME
Config.Description: The Paperless-ngx database name.

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_DBUSER
Config.Description: The database username.

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_DBPASS
Config.Description: The database user password.

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_SECRET_KEY
Config.Description: Paperless uses this to make session tokens.

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_URL
Config.Description: Configures ALLOWED_HOSTS, CORS_ALLOWED_HOSTS, and CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS all at once.

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_OCR_LANGUAGE
Config.Description: The language that will be used when parsing documents: https://docs.paperless-ngx.com/configuration/#PAPERLESS_OCR_LANGUAGE

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_OCR_LANGUAGES
Config.Description: Additional OCR languages to install: https://docs.paperless-ngx.com/configuration/#PAPERLESS_OCR_LANGUAGES

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_TIKA_ENABLED
Config.Description: Toggle the Tika parser.

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_TIKA_ENDPOINT
Config.Description: The endpoint URL to reach your Tika server.

Config.Name: PAPERLESS_TIKA_GOTENBERG_ENDPOINT
Config.Description: The endpoint URL to reach your Gotenberg server.
